bibl.title: Supplementum Hellenisticum. Indices in hoc Supplementum necnon in Powellii Collectanea Alexandrina confecit H.-G. Nesselrath.
bibl.note: Cf. Hugh Lloyd-Jones, A Hellenistic Miscellany, StIt 3a s., 2 (1984) pp. 52-72.
bibl.seg: Lloyd-Jones Hugh et Peter Parsons, Supplementum Hellenisticum. Indices in hoc Supplementum necnon in Powellii Collectanea Alexandrina confecit H.-G. Nesselrath. (Texte und Kommentare. 11.)
Berlin - New York, W. de Gruyter, 1983, 8°, xxxii-863 pp.
Cf. Hugh Lloyd-Jones, A Hellenistic Miscellany, StIt 3a s., 2 (1984) pp. 52-72.

C.R. par Thomas Gelzer, MusHelv 41 (1984) pp. 250-251. - André Hurst, JHS 105 (1985) pp. 200-201. - Enrico Livrea, Gnomon 57 (1985) pp. 592-601. - Juan Rodríguez Somolinos, Emerita 53 (1985) pp. 357-360. - François Chamoux, REG 99 (1986) pp. 389. - Paola Radici Colace, RPL 9 (1986) pp. 274-279 (non vidimus). - Franco Montanari, Athenaeum 65 (1987) pp. 280-283. - Georges Nachtergael, AntCl 57 (1988) pp. 358-359.
